page.title: 09Innes Design
page.content: Mr Innes is a designer, his office is in Auchencairn. He designs tractor cabs, speed boats, cars and caravans. He sells his designs all over the world.He designs tractor cabs for Fords, his latest design has dark windows and has digital instruments inside. The engine is covered, not open as it is on most tractors. One of his best known designs is of an electrically driven car which can seat one person, it will be used in towns. When he starts a new design he first of all makes a model to see how it will look, then he takes photographs of it, adding different colours till he thinks it looks right. From the time he makes the first drawing until the design is in production can take from three to five years.
